import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' function Login() { const [user, setUser] = useState({username:'',password:''}) console.log(useLocation()) const handleForm = function(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(user) } const handleChange = function(e) { const {name, value} = e.target setUser((prev)=> ({...prev, [name]:value})) } return (
